metered_data.functions.df_peakyness(sums_df, weekdays)¶

Creates daily dataframe with peak three hour period identified, total recorded, and peak norm recorded.

Parameters
sums_dfdataframe, required

Daily sums flow for timeseries dataframe

weekdaysdataframe, required

Time sercies dataframe of flow values

metered_data.functions.group_days_dict(df)¶

Returns dictionary where keys are dates (string), and values are time series index dataframes sliced from full dataframe for that date only. Used for creating line plot of all weekdays plotted on the same 24 hours.

Parameters
dfdataframe, required
metered_data.functions.normalize(df)¶

Normalized time series index dataframe by sum of daily values.

Parameters
dfdataframe, required
metered_data.functions.remove_incomplete_days(df)¶

Remove days were not all hours are recorded in the dataset. This function is not very efficient right now and could use some work.

Parameters
dfdataframe
